item.description: You are invited to our Meet Up Dance Party Sunday Evenings at the Knights of Columbus Hall in Salem, Mass. The doors open at 7 to 11 PM for an evening of dance adventure and romance. Possibly meet that special one. A 4,000 square foot hall is available to our group of 300+ dancers. Smart casual attire, jeans are OK, and the admission is $10. Dancers can bring your favorite music Cd's and we will play some special requests. Beginner partner and or line dance lesson with a guest instructor. Parking is available around the Salem Common and in the rear lot of the Knights Hall. There is room for many hundreds of dancers and bring lots of your friends. Don't miss out of this great night of dance fun and adventure. Hope to see you at our next dance Meet Up. Clint Guy
item.name: Aspire," Singles and Couples Dance Party" Meet Up North Shore
